477130.name: Surge
477130.description:
Surge is one of the first real-time VR music videos created for the new generation of VR headsets and gives an amazing insight in the possibilities of VR as a medium for music videos. The seamless fusion between music and visual effects come to life in an overwhelming experience which transports the viewer into a world caught in a permanent sunset, inhabited by mysterious abstract creatures. You have to see it to believe it.


Both the visual experience and the music of Surge are created by Arjan van Meerten.

Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR
